title: Photos: Exploring Florence, Italy From a Different Angle
body: Photographer Pari Dukovic captures the beauty of Florence landmarks like Michelangelo's David, Cappella dei Principi, and the Ponte Vecchio in such a way that makes you reconsider the popular destination—recently voted the world's no. 1 city by Condé Nast Traveler readers—through a new lens.
